on reading compounds: 警官【ケイカン】police officer, policeman, constable
警戒【ケイカイ】vigilance, caution, alertness, precaution, being on guard
kun reading compounds: 戒める【いましめる】to warn against, to caution against, to admonish, to scold, to rebuke, to prohibit, to forbid, to ban, to be cautious, to detest, to loathe, to punish
